input: What is Innovatech Inc.'s refund policy?
retrieval_context:
Innovatech Inc. - Customer FAQ (Internal Use Only)

Welcome to the Innovatech Inc. support knowledge base. 

1. Company Mission: Our mission is to build next-generation AI tools that empower creative professionals. We believe in innovation, integrity, and customer-centric design.

2. Refund Policy: Customers may request a full refund within 30 days of purchase for any of our software products. Hardware products (e.g., 'ChromaKey' keyboard) are subject to a 15-day refund window and may incur a 10% restocking fee.

3. Support Channels: For technical support, please email support@innovatech.ai. Our phone support line (1-800-555-1234) is available for 'Enterprise' plan customers only, from 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time.

4. Product: 'ChromaKey' Keyboard: This is a professional editing keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting and 20 dedicated macro keys. It is not waterproof.

5. Product: 'PixelFlow' Software: A subscription-based AI image generation tool. 'Basic' plans have 100 credits/month. 'Pro' plans have unlimited credits and access to beta features. All plans use our proprietary 'Firefly' v3 model.
expected_output: Innovatech offers a 30-day full refund for software products. Hardware products, like the 'ChromaKey' keyboard, have a 15-day refund window and may have a 10% restocking fee.
